title: Our pledge to diversify the space industry workforce continues | Open Letter
summary: The results from the first year of Space Workforce 2030 activity are in and we are trending in a positive direction. We are optimistic about our path forward, even as we remain realistic about the challenges we face and the work still to be done to make space more representative of everyone—by and beyond the year 2030.

title: SpaceX Starship completes first successful test flight
summary: SpaceX’s Starship completed its first successful flight test with an incredible liftoff at South Padre Island, Texas, after years of testing and...

title: Starship lifts off on first integrated test flight, breaks apart minutes later
summary: SpaceX’s first integrated Starship vehicle lifted off on a long-anticipated test flight April 20, only to tumble and break apart minutes later.

title: NASA starts consortium for ISAM technologies
summary: NASA announced April 19 the creation of a new organization devoted to advancing technologies for in-space servicing, assembly and manufacturing (ISAM).
